entry.title: CI and Team Chef Development Using Berkshelf
entry.content:
In the past two weeks I have been to both ChefConf and DevOpsDays Austin. Both of these events were full of genuinely smart, geeky, and accessable folks who were all a pleasure to talk to.

One of the hot topics on my agenda is building a workflow for team Chef development that allows for continuous integration to be performed on cookbooks, and prevents folks from stepping on each other's toes on a shared Chef server. A key component of this workflow is Berkshelf.
